entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
